name: Mad Scientist (Tyrant's Wrath)
description:
Story: 

You are scientist who was doing some experiments when you were exposed to some chemicals, and went all mad, and started wrecking havoc on your lab. 

I am thinking of adding this game too Google play store some time next week, not certain about though. The UI, and everything is very flexible & can scale for every resolution. 

I will be releasing a game every month for the rest of the year, and to see the progress feel free to check out(I post daily):

Discord: https://discord.gg/WygjXgYh96

Devlog: https://tyrantswrath.blogspot.com/

Controls:

A-D-W-S to move,

Q to switch weapon,

LMB to shoot.
